about.intro: I'm a passionate software engineer based in Maryland with 1.5 years of hands-on work experience developing new features and improving existing ones.
about.description: I love the challenge of finding creative solutions to complex problems. Every project is an opportunity to learn, grow, and create something amazing.
additionalInfo: Passionate about clean code and user experience
Team player with strong communication skills

contact.title: Let's Connect
contact.subtitle: I'd love to hear from you!
contact.description: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your visions. Feel free to reach out!
